title: API Documentation & Versioning
description: Generate comprehensive documentation for the backend APIs to make it easier for frontend developers to use and understand.
acceptance_criteria: Provide clear descriptions of endpoints, parameters, and responses
Enable easy integration with the backend
Facilitate API versioning and backwards compatibility
The API documentation should be automatically generated from the code and kept up-to-date.

recommendations: Integrate a documentation generation tool like Swagger or OpenAPI.
Configure the tool to generate documentation from the code comments.
Add code comments to document each endpoint, its parameters, and the expected response.
